{{cpp/chrono/month_weekday/title|ok}}
{{cpp/chrono/month_weekday/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|1=
constexpr bool ok() const noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

检查所含的 {{ltt|cpp/chrono/month}} 和 {{ltt|cpp/chrono/weekday_indexed}} 对象是否均合法。

=== 返回值 ===
{{c|month().ok() &amp;&amp; weekday_indexed().ok()}}

===示例===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;cassert&gt;
#include &lt;chrono&gt;

int main()
{
    auto mwdi{std::chrono::March/std::chrono::Friday[1]};
    assert(mwdi.ok());

    mwdi = {std::chrono::month(17)/std::chrono::Friday[1]}; 
    assert(not mwdi.ok());

    mwdi = {std::chrono::March/std::chrono::Friday[-4]}; 
    assert(not mwdi.ok());
}
}}
